src.zip_lookup.zipcode package¶

Submodules¶

src.zip_lookup.zipcode.zipcode_lookup module¶

Process the zip code.

This module process the zip code got from the front end. Specifically, get the county and population of it.

class src.zip_lookup.zipcode.zipcode_lookup.ZipCode(zipcode)[source]¶

Bases: object

Create zipcode object and process it.

This class create zipcode object using the given zip code and process it. This class provide two methods. get_county() is used to get the county of the given zip code. get_population() is used to get the population of this zip code.

Parameters

zipcode (str) – The zip code that is going to be processed.

zipcode¶

The zip code that is going to be processed.

Type

str

get_county()[source]¶

Get the county of the given zip code.

This method get the county of the given zip code using Zip API. The URL of this API is https://zipapi.us. The usage of this API to get county:

https://service.zipapi.us/zipcode/county/47858?X-API-KEY=your_api_key :returns: The string of the county if the response status is true,or None if it is failed.

get_population()[source]¶

Get the population if this zip code.

This method get the population of the given zip code using Zip API. The URL of this API is https://zipapi.us. The usage of this API to get population:

https://service.zipapi.us/population/zipcode/90210?X-API-KEY=your_api_key &fields=male_population,female_population

Returns

The string of the population if response status is true, or None if failed.
